welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Corro de Vall, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. Get ready to immerse yourself in its unique culture and indulge in the local cuisine. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories exploring our city!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Prat De Llobregat Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at El Prat De Llobregat Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Girona-Costa Brava Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Girona-Costa Brava Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
